name.baseName: Large yellow croaker production ;Large yellow croaker adult fish ; Deep water windstorm cage culture
大黄鱼生产;大黄鱼成鱼;深水抗风浪网箱养殖

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The system boundary of large yellow croaker cage culture includes the production of materials required for the construction of large yellow croaker cages (wood, polyethylene and cement), the production of materials required for large yellow croaker culture (compound feed, formaldehyde and refrigerators, etc.), the transportation of various materials and the production of aquaculture processes and the production and consumption of energy used in each process. It does not include the hatching of large yellow croaker fry to the breeding of semi-adult fish and the processing of large yellow croaker adult fish.
大黄鱼网箱养殖的系统边界包括大黄鱼网箱建设所需材料（木材、聚乙烯和水泥）的生产、大黄鱼养殖所需资料（配合饲料、甲醛和电冰箱等）的生产、各种材料的运输和养殖过程生产及各过程使用能源的生产和消耗。不包括大黄鱼鱼苗的孵化到半成鱼的养殖和大黄鱼成鱼的加工的过程。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The literature does not specify the data or sampling time, and the breeding seedlings were purchased in June 2014, and the breeding period was about 6 months
文献未说明数据或采样时间，由养殖幼苗购买于2014年6月，养殖周期约6个月进行估测

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The study is located in Dongji Town, Zhoushan City, China, large yellow croaker deep water cage culture base
舟山市东极镇大黄鱼深水大网箱养殖基地

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The deep water windstorm cage is made of high-density polyethylene circular floating cage. The net coat is generally made of polyethylene material or nylon material. The material of the net coat can effectively protect the large yellow croaker and prevent the large yellow croaker from scratching. The bottom of the cage is equipped with a certain amount of weight to ensure that the mesh is formed underwater.
大黄鱼网箱养殖技术。深水抗风浪网箱采用高密度聚乙烯的圆形浮动式网箱，网衣一般使用聚乙烯材料或尼龙材料制成，网衣的材质可以有效地保护大黄鱼，防止大黄鱼刮伤。 网箱底部配以一定量的沉子，确保网衣在水下成形。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The large yellow croaker deep water windstorm-resistant cage culture process is designed to raise adult large yellow croakers for the seafood market. This aquaculture method can be utilized by the fisheries sector, particularly in offshore marine areas where fish are cultured to marketable size within constructed cages that are made to withstand harsh open-water conditions.
大黄鱼深水抗风浪网箱养殖过程旨在为海鲜市场养育成鱼大黄鱼。这种水产养殖方法可被渔业部门使用，尤其适用于海洋离岸区域，鱼类在建造的网箱内养成市场销售大小，这些网箱能承受恶劣的开放水域条件。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The world environmental impact per capita baseline for 2000 was used as the baseline for data standardization; The weighted evaluation uses the weight coefficient set by the panel review
数据标准化基准值采用了 2000 年世界人均环境影响基准值；加权评估采用专家组评议设置的权重系数

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: This study calculates life cycle pollution emission based on pollutant emission according to the calculation formula. The energy consumption and environmental emission data of the energy production and use process, the production of polyethylene, refrigerator, preservative wood, cement and formaldehyde were respectively referred to the research results of the existing literature. Pollutant emissions from diesel combustion refer to the United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) List of automotive diesel production and combustion
本研究基于污染物排放按照计算公式来计算生命周期污染排放。研究中能源生产和使用过程的、生产聚乙烯、电冰箱、防腐木、水泥和甲醛的能源消耗和环境排放数据分别参考已有文献的研究结果。柴油燃烧所产生的污染物排放参考美国 环保总署（EPA）关于汽车用柴油生产与燃烧清单

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: For each breeding or production stage of large yellow croaker cage culture, the basic data were collected through direct field detection, or indirect literature search and reports of government companies. The validity and authenticity of the data are very important. The correct data should be further collected and distributed for the establishment of the life cycle list. When the collected data is invalid, the collection method should be adjusted to transform it into valid data. The data that is still invalid or wrong should be eliminated, and the relevant data should be supplemented
针对大黄鱼网箱养殖的各个养殖或者生产阶段，通过直接的实地检测途径，或者间接的文献检索和政府公司的报告等进行基础数据的收集；然后对数据进行鉴 别，数据的有效性与真实性很重要，对正确无误的数据进行进一步的收集和分配， 用于生命周期清单的建立；收集的数据为无效的数据时，对收集方法进行调整， 转化为有效地数据，依然无效或错误的数据需要剔除，而相关的数据则需要进行补充
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The literature calculates carbon footprints based on inventories and emission factors, and the emission factor data come from other literature and reported data.Each input data is converted according to the service life of the corresponding material
文献基于清单和排放因子计算碳足迹，排放因子数据来自其他文献及报告性数据。各输入数据按照对应物资的使用寿命进行了折算

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 付晓洋. 基于生命周期评价的大黄鱼网箱养殖环境影响分析. (浙江海洋大学, 2016).
付晓洋. 基于生命周期评价的大黄鱼网箱养殖环境影响分析. (浙江海洋大学, 2016).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: The data mainly comes from Zhejiang Da Ocean Technology Co., LTD., which conducts deep-water windwave-resistant cage farming of large yellow croaker in Dongji Town, Putuo District, Zhoushan City.
数据主要来自浙江大海洋科技有限公司，该公司在舟山市普陀区的东极镇进行大黄鱼的深水抗风浪网箱养殖。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The data set covers the life cycle of large yellow croaker culture in deep water windstorm-resistant cages, excluding the phases of hatching and semi-adult fish breeding as well as adult fish processing. Users should not include these excluded processes in their environmental impact calculations and should ensure the correct scope of application when utilizing this data for LCA in the seafood industry. Attention should be given to methodological consistency, especially pertaining to the boundaries defined for this system.
本数据集涵盖在深水抗风浪网箱中养殖大黄鱼的生命周期，不包括大黄鱼苗孵化到半成鱼养殖以及成鱼加工的阶段。用户在使用这些数据进行环境影响计算时，不应包括这些被排除的过程，并且在利用这些数据进行海鲜行业LCA时应确保正确的应用范围。应特别关注方法论的一致性，特别是与为本系统定义的边界有关。

completeness.common:other: Input data include the production of materials required for the construction of large yellow croaker cages (wood, polyethylene and cement), the production of materials required for large yellow croaker breeding (compound feed, formaldehyde and refrigerators, etc.), the transportation of various materials and the production and consumption of energy used in each process. It does not include the hatching of large yellow croaker fry to the breeding of semi-adult fish and the processing of large yellow croaker adult fish.
输入数据包括包括大黄鱼网箱建设所需材料（木材、聚乙烯和水泥）的生产、大黄鱼养殖所需材料（配合饲料、甲醛和电冰箱等）的生产、各种材料的运输和养殖过程生产及各过程使 用能源的生产和消耗，不包括大黄鱼鱼苗的孵化到半成鱼的养殖和大黄鱼成鱼的 加工的过程。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
